QuestData.Title: One Bad Apple
QuestData.Description:
Rot starve gnolls.
Rot hurt friends.
We kill rot now. Is what Mon-Arks do.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This nasty treant has been teaching gnolls decay magic. And bad hygiene.
QuestData.RewardText:
Me lead gnolls to better hunt now. You... not so bad. Gnolls hungry though, and you still meat.
Leave. Me no chase.
